messages.title: Growing Outrage Against the Birmingham Labour MPs who failed to Support Cadbury
messages.content: Councillor Nigel Dawkins writes to MPs to express concern over Cadbury falling into foreign hands and the risks of job losses. Mentions Labour MPs failing to support this initiative and not receiving a reply from Steve McCabe.

mentions.tacticalSituation: By voting Conservative in this constituency you help to remove Gordon Brown. A vote for anyone else won't do it!

issues.governance: Expresses concern over Cadbury falling into foreign hands and potential job losses.

leaflet.personalStatement: More and more people are offering to help my campaign over the next few months 'Can you be one of them?' asks Parliamentary Candidate Councillor Nigel Dawkins
